Key Match Events: The Kings went on a 20-10 run to regain the lead capped with a 3-pointer by Monk with 4:21 remaining.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kings guard Devin Carter, the son of Grizzlies assistant coach Anthony Carter, made his debut with the team in the first quarter.
Others: The Kings dished out 21 assists in the first half. Three players had four or more.
